headline.main: Hollande says unity "best weapon" after attack suspects killed
headline.sub: Hollande says unity "best weapon" after attack suspects killed

docs.lead_paragraph: French President Francois Hollande says that national unity is the "best weapon" against future security threats, after three gunman were killed in two separate police assaults. Jillian Kitchener reports.
docs.snippet: French President Francois Hollande says that national unity is the "best weapon" against future security threats, after three gunman were killed in two separate police assaults. Jillian Kitchener reports....

headline.main: Overstock.com Installs Bitcoin ATM at Utah Headquarters
headline.print_headline: Overstock.com Installs Bitcoin ATM at Utah Headquarters

docs.lead_paragraph: Online retailer Overstock.com has installed a bitcoin ATM at its corporate headquarters in Salt Lake City.
docs.snippet: Online retailer Overstock.com has installed a bitcoin ATM at its corporate headquarters in Salt Lake City....

headline.main: Arkansas Ex-Judge in Charlize Theron Adoption Case Pleads Guilty to Bribery
headline.print_headline: Arkansas Ex-Judge in Charlize Theron Adoption Case Pleads Guilty to Bribery

docs.lead_paragraph: A former Arkansas judge forced from the bench for disclosing confidential information about an adoption by actress Charlize Theron pleaded guilty to a federal bribery charge on Friday in an unrelated case.
docs.snippet: A former Arkansas judge forced from the bench for disclosing confidential information about an adoption by actress Charlize Theron pleaded guilty to a federal bribery charge on Friday in an unrelated case....

headline.main: After String of Jet Crashes, a Struggle to Re-Train Pilots
headline.print_headline: After String of Jet Crashes, a Struggle to Re-Train Pilots

docs.lead_paragraph: As investigators hunt for what caused an AirAsia jet to crash in an equatorial storm on Dec 28, the aviation industry is still struggling to apply the lessons of accidents in similar weather over the past decade.
docs.snippet: As investigators hunt for what caused an AirAsia jet to crash in an equatorial storm on Dec 28, the aviation industry is still struggling to apply the lessons of accidents in similar weather over the past decade....

headline.main: US Issues Global Travel Warning After Terror Attacks
headline.print_headline: US Issues Global Travel Warning After Terror Attacks

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States has issued a global travel warning after recent terror attacks in France, Australia and Canada.
docs.snippet: The United States has issued a global travel warning after recent terror attacks in France, Australia and Canada....

headline.main: Victims of Quebec Oil-By-Rail Disaster Agree to $200 Million Settlement
headline.print_headline: Victims of Quebec Oil-By-Rail Disaster Agree to $200 Million Settlement

docs.lead_paragraph: Victims of the Lac-Megantic oil-by-rail disaster that killed 47 people in the Canadian province of Quebec in 2013 agreed to a nearly $200 million settlement with some of the firms involved, including the insolvent rail operator at the center of the tragedy, a lawyer for the victims said on Friday.
docs.snippet: Victims of the Lac-Megantic oil-by-rail disaster that killed 47 people in the Canadian province of Quebec in 2013 agreed to a nearly $200 million settlement with some of the firms involved, including the insolvent rail operator at the center of th...

headline.main: Australia Declare Leaving India Target of 349 to Win
headline.print_headline: Australia Declare Leaving India Target of 349 to Win

docs.lead_paragraph: Australia declared their second innings closed at 251 for six before play of the fifth and final day of the fourth test on Saturday, handing India a target of 349 for victory.
docs.snippet: Australia declared their second innings closed at 251 for six before play of the fifth and final day of the fourth test on Saturday, handing India a target of 349 for victory....

headline.main: Off-Duty NC Trooper Rescues Mother, 2 Kids From Icy Creek
headline.print_headline: Off-Duty NC Trooper Rescues Mother, 2 Kids From Icy Creek

docs.lead_paragraph: An off-duty state trooper is being credited with saving a mother and her two children after their car skidded off an icy North Carolina road and flipped into a creek.
docs.snippet: An off-duty state trooper is being credited with saving a mother and her two children after their car skidded off an icy North Carolina road and flipped into a creek....

headline.main: London cleric Abu Hamza sentenced to life in U.S. prison
headline.sub: London cleric Abu Hamza sentenced to life in U.S. prison

docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. judge sentences radical imam Abu Hamza al-Masri to life in prison following federal terrorism charges. Nathan Frandino reports.
docs.snippet: A U.S. judge sentences radical imam Abu Hamza al-Masri to life in prison following federal terrorism charges. Nathan Frandino reports....

headline.main: Parties Take Step Toward Settlement for Oil Train Victims
headline.print_headline: Parties Take Step Toward Settlement for Oil Train Victims

docs.lead_paragraph: Parties involved in a proposed $200 million settlement fund for victims of a fiery train disaster that killed 47 people asked a Canadian judge Friday to give them until September to pin down the details.
docs.snippet: Parties involved in a proposed $200 million settlement fund for victims of a fiery train disaster that killed 47 people asked a Canadian judge Friday to give them until September to pin down the details....
